content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Area at (0,0) to (6,4)
Consists of four stone furnaces for smelting iron:
- Furnace 1 at (0,0)
- Furnace 2 at (2,0) 
- Furnace 3 at (4,4)
- Furnace 4 at (6,4)
All furnaces have coal fuel and iron plate output storage

### Copper Smelting Area at (0,4)
Consists of two stone furnaces for smelting copper:
- Copper Furnace 1 at (0,4)
- Copper Furnace 2 at (2,4)
Both furnaces have coal fuel and copper plate output storage

### Research Lab at (8.5,0.5)
Single lab structure loaded with automation science packs but currently unpowered

### Power Generation System at (-9.5,19.5)
Incomplete power generation setup consisting of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5,24.5) for water input
- Boiler at (-9.5,23.0) with coal fuel
- Steam engine at (-9.5,19.5)
Components are placed but not properly connected with pipes/fluid system

# ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Errors
- Check if target location is clear and terrain is suitable before placing entities
- Steam engines cannot be placed on water tiles
- Ensure you have the required entity in inventory before attempting placement

### Resource/Item Availability Errors
- Verify required items are in inventory before inserting into entities
- When crafting complex items, ensure all sub-components can be crafted or are available
- For automated crafting (like copper plates), ensure proper production facilities exist

### Connection/Fluid System Errors
- Power generation components (pump, boiler, steam engine) need proper pipe connections
- Ensure entities that need to be connected are properly aligned and within connection range
- Use appropriate connection entities (pipes) between fluid-carrying structures

### Type Operation Errors
- Building box dimensions calculation needs proper type handling for entity dimensions
- Avoid direct operations on model attributes without proper type conversion

### Power Network Issues
- Lab requires power to function - ensure power generation system is complete and connected
- Steam engine needs proper fluid input connections to generate power
